title: Panel, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: deflected element and withdrawn element work
description: Oblong panel with elaborate patterns of drawn work with the main elements of the design reserved in the linen ground. Embroidered outlines and details. Symmetrical design of curving lines, flowers and vines originating from central motif. Lower edge trimmed with bobbin lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, late 18th century.Medium: linen
Technique: deflected element and withdrawn element work. 1952-162-119.
